members.name: allowDeselect
members.doc: Allow users to deselect a record in a DataView, List or Grid. Only applicable when the mode is 'SINGLE'.
members.short_doc: Allow users to deselect a record in a DataView, List or Grid. ...

deprecated.text: Keyboard navigation is a function of the view's navigation model, and is enabled for accessibilty purposes.

members.name: ignoreRightMouseSelection
members.doc: True to ignore selections that are made when using the right mouse button if there are records that are already selected. If no records are selected, selection will continue as normal
members.short_doc:
True to ignore selections that are made when using the right mouse button if there are

members.name: mode
members.doc:
Mode of selection. Valid values are:

  • "SINGLE" - Only allows selecting one item at a time. Use allowDeselect to allow deselecting that item. Also see toggleOnClick. This is the default.
  • "SIMPLE" - Allows simple selection of multiple items one-by-one. Each click in grid will either select or deselect an item.
  • "MULTI" - Allows complex selection of multiple items using Ctrl and Shift keys.
members.short_doc: Mode of selection. ...

members.name: pruneRemoved
members.doc:
Remove records from the selection when they are removed from the store.

Important: When using paging or a Ext.data.BufferedStore, records which are cached in the Store's data collection may be removed from the Store when pages change, or when rows are scrolled out of view. For this reason pruneRemoved should be set to false when using a buffered Store.

Also, when previously pruned pages are returned to the cache, the records objects in the page will be new instances, and will not match the instances in the selection model's collection. For this reason, you MUST ensure that the Model definition's idProperty references a unique key because in this situation, records in the Store have their IDs compared to records in the SelectionModel in order to re-select a record which is scrolled back into view.
members.short_doc: Remove records from the selection when they are removed from the store. ...

members.name: selected
members.doc: The Ext.util.Collection to use as the collection of selected records.
members.short_doc: The Ext.util.Collection to use as the collection of selected records. ...

members.name: store
members.doc: The store in which this selection model represents the selected subset.

members.name: toggleOnClick
members.doc: true to toggle the selection state of an item when clicked. Only applicable when the mode is 'SINGLE'. Only applicable when the allowDeselect is 'true'.
members.short_doc: true to toggle the selection state of an item when clicked. ...

members.name: pruneRemovedOnRefresh
members.doc: onStoreRefresh asks if it should remove from the selection any selected records which are no longer findable in the store after the refresh. Subclasses may override this. TreeModel does not use the pruneRemoved flag because records are being added and removed from TreeStores on expand and collapse. It uses the pruneRemovedNodes flag.

members.name: updateSelectedInstances
members.doc:
Called when the store is refreshed. Selected records which are no longer present in the store are removed if pruneRemoved is true.

Selected records which are still present have their instances in the passed collection updated.
